    • Method Detail

      • send

        public int send(byte[] data)
        Description copied from class: Client
        This client sends data to the server.

        The method returns -1 and throws a disconnectedEvent if the connection has been broken.

        Overrides:
        send in class Client
        Parameters:
        data - the data to be sent
        Returns:
        the number of bytes sent to the server.
